Player History
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to Baltimore on 4/1/1965 (Going to LAN: 3B F. Jaciuk, P G. Rounsaville. Going to BAL: P B. Lee, RF F. Alou)...
Was selected to the 1965 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/31/1966 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1966, winning 2 games with a 0.60 ERA...
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/4/1967 to a 5-year deal worth $13,500,000 per year...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 5/31/1968 (Going to CHC: LF R. Zisk, P P. Borbon Sr.. Going to NYM: P B. Lee, CF L. Brock, P S. Shea)...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1969, going 5-1, 0.78...
Injured on 6/14/1969 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1969...
Injured on 4/7/1970 with a Fractured Elbow, out for 8-9 weeks...
Injured on 8/15/1970 with a Inflamed Bicep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1971, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1971, going 5-1, 0.61...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1976...
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1978...
Injured on 4/14/1978 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1981, off Ed Acosta (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1981, off Dave Pagan (CAL)...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1981...
Traded from Baltimore to San Francisco on 7/31/1982 (Going to SF: 1B B. Horner. Going to BAL: 3B H. Matsunaga, CF M. Jordan)...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 8/28/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1982, hitting .526 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 8/12/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1984, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 9/10/1984 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 7/27/1985...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1986, hitting .438 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Atlanta on 10/2/1986...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 4/23/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1988, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
